title: Relates to giving the state soil and water conservation committee membership to the New York ocean and Great Lakes ecosystem conservation council
summary: Relates to giving the state soil and water conservation committee membership to the New York ocean and Great Lakes ecosystem conservation council.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2840

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   February 2, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by Sen. YOUNG -- (at request of the Legislative Commission on
         Rural  Resources)  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when printed
         to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         giving  the  state soil and water conservation committee membership to
         the New York ocean and Great Lakes ecosystem conservation council

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  1  of  section  14-0107 of the environmental
    2  conservation law, as added by chapter  432  of  the  laws  of  2006,  is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    1.  There is hereby created the New York ocean and Great Lakes ecosys-
    5  tem conservation council. The council shall  consist  of  the  following
    6  [nine]  TEN  members:  the  commissioners  of  agriculture  and markets,
    7  economic  development,  environmental  conservation,  general  services,
    8  parks,  recreation  and  historic  preservation, and transportation; the
    9  secretary of state; the president of the energy research and development
   10  authority; THE CHAIRMAN OF THE STATE SOIL AND WATER CONSERVATION COMMIT-
   11  TEE; and the chancellor of the state university of New  York;  or  their
   12  respective designees.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07952-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to giving the state soil and water conservation committee membership to the New York ocean and Great Lakes ecosystem conservation council
